item.title: Dave Stokes talks open - Stoking the flames of open source - Episode 2 - Percona Live 2022
item.description: Bruce Momjian, VP, Postgres Evangelist at EDB, and Charly Batista, PostgreSQL Tech Lead at Percona joined Dave Stokes, Technical Evangelist at Percona Live 2022. This is the recording of their talk on all things Postgres-related and OpenSource technologies. Video Link: https://youtu.be/dcoQmgV2kBA

item.title: Dave Stokes talks open - Stoking the flames of open source - Episode 1 - Percona Live 2022
item.description: Listen to the interviews from PerconaLive 2022. David Stokes invited amazing guests to talk to him about open source technologies. Video Link: https://youtu.be/cOK4hzRLszo
